sorular.soru: Which vehicles are you not allowed to drive when your driving licence is suspended?

feedback.metin: When your driving licence is suspended you are not allowed to drive any motor carriage. So not only driving a passenger car is prohibited, but also a brommobiel, moped or snorfiets. A bicycle is not a motor carriage, so you are still allowed to ride a bicycle.

sorular.soru: Which vehicles should you expect from the opposite direction?

feedback.metin: This combination of signs indicates a one-way street, that only applies to the vehicles shown on the supplementary plate. This plate shows two symbols, a motorcycle (applies to all motorcycles) and a passenger car from the front (applies to all motor vehicles on more than two wheels). This means that the sign above applies to all motor vehicles. You should not expect motor vehicles from the opposite direction. Cyclists and moped riders are allowed to ride in the opposite direction, these vehicles are not motor vehicles.
